Package com.madrobot.io

I/O Utilities to assist with the most complex of I/O tasks with simple yet powerful error handling and management

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOProgressCallback
    Tracks the progress of an I/O operation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitInputStream  
    BitOutputStream  
    CopyInputStream
    An input stream that allows you to make copies of any src i/p stream
    FastByteArrayOutputStream
    ByteArrayOutputStream thats NOT thread safe.
    IOUtils  
    LimitedInputStream
    An input stream, which limits its data size.
    NIOUtils  
    NullOutputStream
    This OutputStream writes all data to the famous /dev/null.
    SerializationUtils
    Assists with the serialization process and performs additional functionality based on serialization.
    UnicodeReader
    Generic Unicode text reader, which uses a BOM (Byte Order Mark) to identify the encoding to be used.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IOUtils.IOState
